trans-unit.source: List Directories and Files
trans-unit.target: List Directories and Files

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Directories and Files</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation returns a list of files or directories under the specified share or directory.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Directories and Files</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation returns a list of files or directories under the specified share or directory.

trans-unit.source: It lists the contents only for a single level of the directory hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: It lists the contents only for a single level of the directory hierarchy.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Directories and Files</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Directories and Files</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is recommended.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: Replace the path components shown in the request URI with your own, as follows:
trans-unit.target: Replace the path components shown in the request URI with your own, as follows:

trans-unit.source: Path Component
trans-unit.target: Path Component

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: myaccount
trans-unit.target: myaccount

trans-unit.source: The name of your storage account.
trans-unit.target: The name of your storage account.

trans-unit.source: myshare
trans-unit.target: myshare

trans-unit.source: The name of your file share.
trans-unit.target: The name of your file share.

trans-unit.source: mydirectorypath
trans-unit.target: mydirectorypath

trans-unit.source: The path to the directory.
trans-unit.target: The path to the directory.

trans-unit.source: For details on path naming restrictions, see <link xlink:href="f38d4c69-cb50-4ef3-a8a3-276341689769" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Naming and Referencing Shares, Directories, Files, and Metadata</link>.
trans-unit.target: For details on path naming restrictions, see <link xlink:href="f38d4c69-cb50-4ef3-a8a3-276341689769" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Naming and Referencing Shares, Directories, Files, and Metadata</link>.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: The following additional parameters may be specified on the URI.
trans-unit.target: The following additional parameters may be specified on the URI.

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: A string value that identifies the portion of the list to be returned with the next list operation.
trans-unit.target: A string value that identifies the portion of the list to be returned with the next list operation.

trans-unit.source: The operation returns a marker value within the response body if the list returned was not complete.
trans-unit.target: The operation returns a marker value within the response body if the list returned was not complete.

trans-unit.source: The marker value may then be used in a subsequent call to request the next set of list items.
trans-unit.target: The marker value may then be used in a subsequent call to request the next set of list items.

trans-unit.source: The marker value is opaque to the client.
trans-unit.target: The marker value is opaque to the client.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of files and/or directories to return.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum number of files and/or directories to return.

trans-unit.source: If the request does not specify <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference> or specifies a value greater than 5,000, the server will return up to 5,000 items.
trans-unit.target: If the request does not specify <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference> or specifies a value greater than 5,000, the server will return up to 5,000 items.

trans-unit.source: Setting <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference> to a value less than or equal to zero results in error response code 400 (Bad Request).
trans-unit.target: Setting <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference> to a value less than or equal to zero results in error response code 400 (Bad Request).

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="2ea86972-4df0-4b87-97fd-3c88910c15e0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for File Service Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="2ea86972-4df0-4b87-97fd-3c88910c15e0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for File Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.source: The following table describes required and optional request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes required and optional request headers.

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>Date</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-date</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>Date</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-date</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Required for all authenticated requests, optional for anonymous requests.
trans-unit.target: Required for all authenticated requests, optional for anonymous requests.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body in XML format.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body in XML format.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Headers
trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Response header
trans-unit.target: Response header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Specifies the format in which the results are returned.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the format in which the results are returned.

trans-unit.source: Currently this value is <languageKeyword>application/xml</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: Currently this value is <languageKeyword>application/xml</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.
trans-unit.target: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the version of the File service used to execute the request.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the version of the File service used to execute the request.

trans-unit.source: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.
trans-unit.target: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: The format of the XML response is as follows.
trans-unit.target: The format of the XML response is as follows.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <languageKeyword>Marker</languageKeyword> and <languageKeyword>MaxResults</languageKeyword> elements are present only if they were specified on the request URI.
trans-unit.target: Note that the <languageKeyword>Marker</languageKeyword> and <languageKeyword>MaxResults</languageKeyword> elements are present only if they were specified on the request URI.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> element has a value only if the list results are not complete.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> element has a value only if the list results are not complete.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <parameterReference>Content-Length</parameterReference> element is returned in the listing.
trans-unit.target: Note that the <parameterReference>Content-Length</parameterReference> element is returned in the listing.

trans-unit.source: However, this value may not be up-to-date since an SMB client may have modified the file locally.
trans-unit.target: However, this value may not be up-to-date since an SMB client may have modified the file locally.

trans-unit.source: The value of <parameterReference>Content-Length</parameterReference> may not reflect that fact until the handle is closed or the op-lock is broken.
trans-unit.target: The value of <parameterReference>Content-Length</parameterReference> may not reflect that fact until the handle is closed or the op-lock is broken.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve current property values, call <link xlink:href="668f1c01-d54f-408b-b628-c8ab43e8eb85" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get File Properties</link>.
trans-unit.target: To retrieve current property values, call <link xlink:href="668f1c01-d54f-408b-b628-c8ab43e8eb85" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get File Properties</link>.

trans-unit.source: Authorization
trans-unit.target: Authorization

trans-unit.source: Only the account owner may call this operation.
trans-unit.target: Only the account owner may call this operation.

trans-unit.source: The value returned in the <languageKeyword>Content-Length</languageKeyword> element corresponds to the value of the file’s <languageKeyword>x-ms-content-length</languageKeyword> header.
trans-unit.target: The value returned in the <languageKeyword>Content-Length</languageKeyword> element corresponds to the value of the file’s <languageKeyword>x-ms-content-length</languageKeyword> header.

trans-unit.source: Note that each <languageKeyword>Directory</languageKeyword> element returned counts toward the maximum result, just as each <languageKeyword>File</languageKeyword> element does.
trans-unit.target: Note that each <languageKeyword>Directory</languageKeyword> element returned counts toward the maximum result, just as each <languageKeyword>File</languageKeyword> element does.

trans-unit.source: Files and directories are listed intermingled in lexically sorted order in the response body.
trans-unit.target: Files and directories are listed intermingled in lexically sorted order in the response body.

trans-unit.source: Listing is limited to a single level of the directory hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Listing is limited to a single level of the directory hierarchy.

trans-unit.source: In order to list multiple levels, you can make multiple calls in an iterative manner by using the <languageKeyword>Directory</languageKeyword> value returned from one result in a subsequent call to <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Directories and Files</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: In order to list multiple levels, you can make multiple calls in an iterative manner by using the <languageKeyword>Directory</languageKeyword> value returned from one result in a subsequent call to <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Directories and Files</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.
